edu.biu.scapi.paddings
Interface PaddingScheme

All Known Implementing Classes:
BitPadding, NoPadding, PKCS7Padding
public interface PaddingScheme

General interface for padding scheme. Every padding scheme, for example PKCS7, should implement this interface.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

Method Summary
 byte[] pad(byte[] padInput, int padSize)
          Pads the given byte array with padSize bytes according to this padding scheme.
 byte[] removePad(byte[] paddedInput)
          Removes the padding from the given byte array according to this padding scheme.
 

Method Detail

pad

byte[] pad(byte[] padInput,
           int padSize)
Pads the given byte array with padSize bytes according to this padding scheme.

Parameters:
padInput - array to pad
padSize - number of bytes to add to padInput array
Returns:
the padded array

removePad

byte[] removePad(byte[] paddedInput)
Removes the padding from the given byte array according to this padding scheme.

Parameters:
paddedInput - array to remove the padding from
Returns:
the array without the padding
